sentences.en: Apollonius stripped the knowledge of all irrelevancies and fashioned It'systematically.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗尼做了去粗取精和使之系统化的工作.

sentences.en: Development trends of super - high strength aluminum alloy materials are expounded systematically.
sentences.cn: 较系统地阐述了超 高强 铝合金材料的发展趋势.

sentences.en: During 1937 the German museums were systematically purged of " degenerate art ".
sentences.cn: 1937年期间 “ 退化艺术 ” 被系统地从德国各博物馆清除掉.

sentences.en: For the next 12 years, he systematically violated that agreement.
sentences.cn: 在后来的12年内, 他蓄意违反这一协议.

sentences.en: Hawaiian volcanoes are among the most thoroughly studied and systematically monitored active craters in the world.
sentences.cn: 夏威夷火山是世界上研究得最透澈并且受到最严密监视的活火山之一.

sentences.en: If you arrange your picture too systematically the results can look very mannered and artificial.
sentences.cn: 如果你把图画安排得太有条理，就会看上去非常假，不够自然。

sentences.en: In general, only the first two are systematically considered.
sentences.cn: 一般地说, 人们只系统地考虑了前两个方面.

sentences.en: Literature transforms and intensifies ordinary languge, deviates systematically from everyday speach.
sentences.cn: 文学改进并加强普通的语言, 有系统地脱离日常的说话用语.

sentences.en: Never before has anyone systematically looked for the last queen of Egypt.
sentences.cn: 以前没有人曾系统地寻找过这位埃及最后的女王。

sentences.en: Now she began to examine systematically the contents of her drawers and cupboard.
sentences.cn: 现在她开始按次序整理起所有的抽屉和柜橱.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the preparation of Biyanqing Capsule systematically.
sentences.cn: 目的: 系统研究鼻咽清胶囊的制备工艺.

sentences.en: One day a week her mother systematically cleaned and aired each room.
sentences.cn: 她母亲按部就班地每周一次清扫所有的房间并开窗通风。

sentences.en: Rumours of possible human cases in other parts of the country have been systematically followed up.
sentences.cn: 已系统地对关于该国其它地区可能的人间病例的传闻进行跟踪。

sentences.en: The army has systematically violated human rights.
The Mataram forces systematically ravaged the surrounding country.
sentences.cn: 马他兰的军队就有组织地劫掠城市周围的农村.

sentences.en: The pure compound tends to crystallize systematically into cubic form.
sentences.cn: 纯化合物倾向于系统地结晶成立方形状.

sentences.en: The rainforest is being systematically destroyed.
The search was carried out systematically.

words.tran_cn: 系统的；体系的；有系统的；[图情] 分类的
组织化；系统化；制度化；组织主义
分类者；组织者；使体系化的人
系统化，体系化（systematize的过去式）
使系统化；使有秩序（等于systematize）
使系统化；使组织化；将…分类
使……系统化；把……分类；组织化

trans.tran_cn: 有系统地，有组织地，有条不紊地
trans.tran_en: done according to a system or plan, in a thorough, efficient or determined way
